incidents.name: Twilio Flex Affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Flex was degraded for 15 minutes between 2:45 PM and 3:00 PM Pacific Time on 1/18/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced issues loading in Twilio Flex. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Twilio Studio Affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Studio was degraded between 12/19/2023 10:18 AM to 1/18/2024 4:01 PM Pacific Time. During this period of time customers may have experienced 81002 errors found during Studio execution. The issue has now been resolved. If you are still experiencing this issue please create a Support ticket for further assistance.
